## dcl-slides package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [NextSlideComponent](./dcl-slides.nextslidecomponent.md) | This Component can be added to an entity. When the entity is clicked, the next slide will be shown. |
|  [PreviousSlideComponent](./dcl-slides.previousslidecomponent.md) | This Component can be added to an entity. When the entity is clicked, the previous slide will be shown. |
|  [Slides](./dcl-slides.slides.md) | This class represents a slide show |
|  [TimedSlideController](./dcl-slides.timedslidecontroller.md) | This class represents a Timed Controller for a slide show. It will automatically change the slide after a certain amount of time. |
